name: S.L.U.G.
description:
Evolve. Escape. Exterminate. Emancipate.

You are a S.L.U.G. (Super Lifeform of Unknown Genesis), and you must free your people.

Controls

  • Spacebar: Everything.

Credits

Design, Programming, and Music: Brian Egana

Art: https://www.opengameart.org/ (with minor edits by Brian Egana)
